lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia has not done enough to investigate and control the deadly Middle Eastern Respiratory Syndrome, United Nations health experts said Monday.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: U.N. Experts Criticize Response to MERS Virus as Inadequate
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: U.N. Experts Criticize Response to MERS Virus as Inadequate

snippet: Saudi Arabia has not done enough to investigate and control the deadly Middle Eastern Respiratory Syndrome, United Nations health experts said Monday.
